Heading: Cambridge Annotated
Note: Contains the work of Howard Clark Kee including a summary of the development of the canon, introductions to the books, notes and cross references. Originally published in 1993, NRSV

Heading: Life Application
Note: A project of Tyndale House Publishers and Zondervan intended to help readers apply the Bible to daily living. Living Bible, King James, New International, NASB

Heading: Macarthur
Note: A King James version study Bible with notes by James Macarthur first published in 1997

Heading: Oxford Annotated
Note: A study Bible originally published in the 1960s and based on the RSV / NRSV

Heading: New Oxford Annotated
Note: Published in 1991 and based on the New Revised Standard version

Heading: Ryrie
Note: Based on the work of Charles C. Ryrie. King James, NI, NASB

Heading: Scofield
Note: A study Bible based on the early 20th century work of C.I. Scofield. Based on the King James version

Heading: Spirit Filled
Note: A transdenominational study Bible for persons from the Pentecostal/Charismatic traditions
